comments:
Build ID:  I20070323-1616

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create a C++ Project.
2. Add a remote folder to the project
3. Open a C++ file from the remote directory. 
4. Ctrl+Tab Toggles between Source & Header. When I click Ctrl+Tab I get an error :
"Toggle Source/Header" did not complete normally. Please see the log for more information.



More information:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2007-05-21 21:21:14.927
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException

I can fix this specific NPE, but CDT is not EFS compatible in general, therefore you will probably get more problems.
